listItem.para: Make sure that smart tags are turned on.

para.legacyBold: How to turn on smart tags

listItem.para: Click the Microsoft Office Button , and then click Excel Options.
Click Proofing, and then click AutoCorrect Options.
Click the Smart Tags tab, and then select the Label data with smart tags check box.

para.legacyBold: Issue: I don’t see any smart tags in the Recognizers list

listItem.para: If you don’t see a list of smart tags in the Recognizers list (on the Smart Tags tab in the AutoCorrect dialog box), the Smart Tags add-in must be installed. To install the add-in, do the following:
On your computer's system disk, locate the following folder:
Type a recognized U.S. financial symbol (for example, MSFT) in a cell. Be sure to type the symbol in uppercase letters.
Move your mouse pointer over the purple triangle in the lower-right corner of the cell, and then click the arrow next to the Smart Tag Actions button to see a list of options.
In the Insert Stock Price dialog box, choose whether to insert the stock price on a new worksheet or in a specific area of your current worksheet.

alert.para: The data that is returned might fill a large portion of your worksheet.
